question:
You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.
Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:

explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six months

say how your work could be done while you are away

ask for his/her help in arranging it,

You should write at least 150 words.
text: I am writing to request permission, to work at our head office in the UK.Interacting with the clients, learning global markets and spending six months in the on-site Location would help me in gaining more knowledge.

I've heard about the new product which is deployed in the client Location.As, I have been promoted as Lead Analyst, would like to grab the opportunity to attend the knowledge transfer and share it with the team.Moreover, the knowledge gained, would help the team in providing support to the product for the upcoming few years, which in turn brings new projects upon successful progress on the new project.

Daily activities, roles and responsibilities are shared with my colleague Mr Paul.He will work on behalf of me,  in my absence at offshore Location.I would be available by Mail and provide the help whenever required.After returning back, I will take over the work and complete any pending tasks by allocating more hours.
I look forward to your reply
